column4: nobody can help me with the nvidia geforce go 7600 graphics issue? :(
type command 'lsmod |grep nvidia" and let us know if you see nvidia
that is because you are using the nv driver... i.e. the open source driver that is default
okay, i have the NVidia binary X.Org driver and the NVidia binary X.Org 'legacy' driver
did you edit the xorg.conf file and change nv to nvidia?
sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf   ... then find the line with "nv" and change to "nvidia"  ... the Ctrl+X and Ctrl+Y then
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and get one there again...
Linux mattg-ubuntu 2.6.20-15-generic #2 SMP Sun Apr 15 06:17:24 UTC 2007 x86_64 GNU/Linux
